paragraphs.content: Psalm 72
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 72

paragraphs.content: A Psalm for Solomon.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Psalm for Solomon.

paragraphs.content: Give the king thy judgments, O God, and thy righteousness unto the king’s son.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Give the king thy judgments, O God, and thy righteousness unto the king’s son.

paragraphs.content: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.

paragraphs.content: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.

paragraphs.content: He shall judge the poor of the people, he shall save the children of the needy, and shall break in pieces the oppressor.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall judge the poor of the people, he shall save the children of the needy, and shall break in pieces the oppressor.

paragraphs.content: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.

paragraphs.content: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers that water the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers that water the earth.

paragraphs.content: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.

paragraphs.content: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth.

paragraphs.content: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.

paragraphs.content: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents: the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents: the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.

paragraphs.content: Yea, all kings shall fall down before him: all nations shall serve him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, all kings shall fall down before him: all nations shall serve him.

paragraphs.content: For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth; the poor also, and him that hath no helper.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth; the poor also, and him that hath no helper.

paragraphs.content: He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.

paragraphs.content: He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence: and precious shall their blood be in his sight.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence: and precious shall their blood be in his sight.

paragraphs.content: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised.

paragraphs.content: There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: and they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: and they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.

paragraphs.content: His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and men shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and men shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed.

paragraphs.content: Blessed be the LORD God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed be the Lord God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.

paragraphs.content: And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen.

paragraphs.content: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
